description:
Istio configuration yamls like Gateway, VirtualService, DestinationRule, ServiceEntry etc. requires k8s apiserver which accepts yamls requests and stores/persists it to etcd store. 

Installation Documentation:

https://hackmd.io/2x2RyuOZS3SUx_n5gTA4cQ
name: istioonmesos-etcd
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently in preview. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. Preview packages should never be used in production!
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS istioonmesos etcd is being installed!

	Documentation: https://hackmd.io/2x2RyuOZS3SUx_n5gTA4cQ
postUninstallNotes: DC/OS istioonmesos etcd has been uninstalled.
